mapper.select: SELECT stored_name FROM image WHERE lodge_no = #{lodge_no}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM Lodge ORDER BY lodge_no DESC ) a ) WHERE rnum <= 6
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM Lodge ORDER BY lodge_no DESC ) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ((#{page} - 1) * 9 + 1) AND (#{page} * 9)
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM Festival ORDER BY festival_no DESC ) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ((#{page} - 1) * 4 + 1) AND (#{page} * 4)
